text: Paulo Ricardo Moroni, known as Moroni (born 29 August 1961), is a former Brazilian football player. He played 5 seasons and 115 games in the Primeira Liga for Braga. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Braga on 13 December 1987 as a starter in a 1–1 draw against Marítimo. ==References== ==External links== Category:1961 births Category:People from Santa Rosa, Rio Grande do Sul Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Esporte Clube Internacional players Category:Guarani FC players Category:CR Vasco da Gama players Category:S.C. title: Paulo Ricardo Moroni
